name: Nice Girl Like Me
description:
"Nice girl like me" is a very classic casual game, which is similar to "fruit ninja". There will be a steady stream of balls of various colors under the screen, and all you need to do is cut them accurately. There are two modes in the game. One is life mode. When you miss 3 fruits or cut to the end of the bomb game. The other is the integral mode, which challenges your highest score within a specified time.

Game mechanism

If you cut more than or equal to 3 fruits at one time, you can get extra points! In addition, the movie part is also set in the game. When the game is enough, you can relax yourself by watching movies.
